greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 2 * arccot(cos(x)).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..250
mathematica: With[{nn=40},Take[CoefficientList[Series[2ArcCot[Cos[x]],{x,0,nn}],x] Range[0,nn]!,{3,-1,2}]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 17 2014 *) (* adapted by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 07 2017 *)
xref: Cf. other sequences with a g.f. of the form sin(x)/(1 - k*sin^2(x)): A012494 (k=-1), A000364 (k=1), A000464 (k=2), A156138 (k=3), A002439 (k=4).
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Dec 27 2004
ext: More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, Nov 17 2014
Signs of the data entries corrected by _Peter Bala_, Feb 06 2017
